cinnamon.engine.utils

Interface ObservableSize<T extends Size>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Size
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageComponent, Window

    public interface ObservableSize<T extends Size>
extends Size

    Describes a Size that allows an ObservableSize.OnResizeListener to be notified whenever either or both width and height are changed.

    When a size change has occurred, all attached OnResizeListeners are notified.

    Created by chris on 6/14/2017.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ObservableSize.OnResizeListener<E extends Size>
      Callback for changes to a Size's width and height.
